summary: The video provides tips on how to find discounted items on Amazon, specifically through the Amazon Outlet section. The speaker explains that these discounts are available year-round, not just during Prime Day, and are due to sellers trying to clear their inventory. The video demonstrates navigating to the Amazon Outlet and shows examples of discounted products, particularly in the computers category, where items are marked down by at least 25%. The speaker encourages viewers to explore the outlet to save money, especially during the Christmas season.
keywords: Amazon, discounted items, Amazon Outlet, Prime Day, sellers, inventory, categories, computers, 25% discount, Christmas, savings
creator_demographic: Age: Unknown, Gender: Unknown, Geographic Location: Unknown
